alert.note: Alert for Burnet; Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 9:40AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Llano and western Burnet Counties through 1030 AM CDT... At 940 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of San Saba to near Cherokee to 7 miles northeast of Art. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burnet, Marble Falls, Kingsland, Llano, Buchanan Dam, Gainesville, Granite Shoals, Horseshoe Bay, Meadowlakes, Buchanan Lake Village, Highland Haven, Castell, Field Creek, Inks Lake State Park, Bluffton, Lake Victor, Baby Head, Stolz, Shady Grove, and Lone Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
